attributes.action: Media blackout if terrorists threaten to kill a British Citizen
attributes.additional_details:
In light of the recent events and British nationals being subject to propaganda material mainly focusing on the ISIS videos that have been seen by many the government should not allow any source of media to report on this.

The reporting of such material gives the Jihadists a key weapon in striking fear across the UK and hysteria. If people didn't see/hear about such horrific acts happening then the videos would have a lot less affect.
